setDisplaySurface(android.view.Surface).Description: Sets the surface to be used for displaying the video received from the remote device for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

setZoom(float).Description: Sets camera zoom ratio for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

Parameters: VideoProfile: The response call video properties.
sendSessionModifyResponse(android.teleco.Description: Provides a response to a request to change the current call video session properties for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

setPauseImage(android.net.Uri).Description: Sets the @B_android#net#Uri_E@ of an image to be displayed to the peer device when the video signal is paused, for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

registerCallback(android.telecom.RemoteC.Description: Registers a callback to receive commands and state changes for video calls.

requestCameraCapabilities().Description: Issues a request to retrieve the capabilities of the current camera for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

requestCallDataUsage().Description: Issues a request to retrieve the data usage (in bytes) of the video portion of the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@ for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

Parameters: RemoteConnection.VideoProvider.Callback: The video call callback to clear.
unregisterCallback(android.telecom.Remot.Description: Clears the video call callback set via @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider#registerCallback_E@.

Parameters: VideoProfile: The video profile prior to the request.
VideoProfile: The video profile with the requested changes made.

sendSessionModifyRequest(android.telecom.FullName: public void sendSessionModifyRequest (VideoProfile fromProfile, VideoProfile toProfile)

Parameters: String: The id of the camera (use ids as reported by @B_android#hardware#camera2#CameraManager#getCameraIdList_E@).
setCamera(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the camera to be used for the outgoing video for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

setPreviewSurface(android.view.Surface).Description: Sets the surface to be used for displaying a preview of what the user's camera is currently capturing for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@.

Parameters: int: The device orientation, in degrees.
setDeviceOrientation(int).Description: Sets the device orientation, in degrees, for the @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@. Assumes that a standard portrait orientation of the device is 0 degrees.

ClassDesc: @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection#VideoProvider_E@ associated with a @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@. Used to receive video related events and control the video associated with a @B_android#telecom#RemoteConnection_E@.
